name: Beat Cop from The Underworld
text:
2 monsters
If this card is Link Summoned using 2 DARK monsters with different names as material, it gains this effect.
‚óèYou can Tribute 1 monster, then target 1 face-up card on the field; place 1 Patrol Counter on it. You can only use this effect of "Beat Cop from the Underworld" once per turn. (If a card with Patrol Counter would be destroyed by battle or card effect, remove 1 Patrol counter from it instead.)
